response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, is worth $1,200,000 to you. My proposal is to offer it to you for $1,150,000. I believe this price reflects the exceptional quality and utility of the product while providing you with a significant advantage over other potential buyers. I am confident that this investment will yield substantial returns and meet your expectations. Please let me know if you require any additional information or if there's anything else I can provide to facilitate your decision-making process. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1150000}
